remarks: The meet of a lattice hyperplane with an element not under it is covered by the element.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2012.)
statement:

lhpmcvr.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.

lhpmcvr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpmcvr $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) ) -> ( X ./\ W ) C X ) $.
